cards.title: Dimension constraints implemented
cards.description: Max 8m x 4m in either orientation. Validation working.

cards.title: Pent roof positioning for attachments
cards.description: Fixed rotation and positioning for all 4 attachment directions (left, right, front, back).

cards.title: Roof height constraints
cards.description: Add min/max validation for eave and crest heights.

cards.title: Marketing landing page
cards.description: Create a landing page to showcase the configurator.

cards.description: Write comprehensive README for the GitHub repo.

cards.description: Added MIT license to the Parametric-shed2 repo.

cards.title: Decision Map page
cards.description: Interactive flowchart for mapping strategic decisions. Added to project board app.

cards.title: Potting Shed preset
cards.description: Created and saved potting shed preset (2m √ó 3.6m) with three windows and pent roof.

cards.title: Parametric shelving system
cards.description: Add shelving as a new element type (like doors/windows). Parameters: wall, inside/outside, height, starting position, length. Include in BOM.

cards.title: Browser access for James
cards.description: Set up browser access so James can interact with the configurator directly for testing and screenshots.

cards.title: Monetization strategy
cards.description: Research and develop monetization options for the configurator.

cards.title: Competitor analysis - UK garden buildings
cards.description: Research competitors in the UK garden building industry. Identify gaps and opportunities.

cards.title: Add screenshot to README
cards.description: Grab a nice screenshot or GIF of the configurator for the README hero image.

cards.title: SEO improvements
cards.description: Improve SEO on bespokeshedcompany.co.uk: better page titles, meta descriptions, local keywords, schema markup.

cards.title: Website rebuild strategy
cards.description: Decide on approach: refresh current, full rebuild, add e-commerce/quote system, or hybrid configurator model.

cards.title: Mobile UX for configurator
cards.description: Improve mobile experience: fix zoom control, auto-collapse panel on load, touch-friendly controls.
